member.name: CRYPT_ENCODE_PARA
member.summary: The CRYPT_ENCODE_PARA structure is used by the function to provide access to memory allocation and memory freeing callback functions.

member.name: CRYPT_ENCODE_PARA.cbSize
member.summary: Indicates the size, in bytes, of the structure.

member.name: CRYPT_ENCODE_PARA.pfnAlloc
member.summary: This member is an optional pointer to a callback function used to allocate memory.

member.name: CRYPT_ENCODE_PARA.pfnFree
member.summary: This member is an optional pointer to a callback function used to free memory allocated by the allocate callback function.
